verses.text: I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* again, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and behold a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with a \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w line|strong="H2256"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, Whither \w goest|strong="H1980"\w* thou? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, To \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \add is\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, and what \add is\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof.

And, behold, the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Run|strong="H7323"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to \w this|strong="H1975"\w* young \w man|strong="H5288"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \add as\add* towns without \w walls|strong="H6519"\w* for the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* and \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* \w therein|strong="H8432"\w*:

For I, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will be unto her a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and will be the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her.

¶ \w Ho|strong="H1945"\w*, \w ho|strong="H1945"\w*, \add come forth\add*, and \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for I have spread you \w abroad|strong="H6566"\w* as the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Deliver|strong="H4422"\w* thyself, \w O|strong="H1945"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, that \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* \add with\add* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w After|strong="H0310"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* hath he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which \w spoiled|strong="H7997"\w* you: for he that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* you \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w apple|strong="H0892"\w* of his \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.

For, behold, I will \w shake|strong="H5130"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon them, and they shall be a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* to their \w servants|strong="H5647"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me.

¶ \w Sing|strong="H7442"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for, lo, I \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall be \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto thee.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* his \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* again.

Be \w silent|strong="H2013"\w*, O all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he is raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* out of his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*.\f + \fr 2.13 \ft his…: Heb. the habitation of his holiness\f*
